entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Qualicum Beach
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:16 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Qualicum Beach Airport 6:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: 8.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 80 %
Dewpoint: 5.4°C
Wind: SE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Rain beginning this evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm except 30 mm between Qualicum Beach and Fanny Bay. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 late in the afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 5 mm. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022
